page.title: 03 Social Concerns
page.content: Undoubtedly the most doninant feature of our area is the Baglan Bay Chemical Works although B.P. takes its environmental responsibilities very seriously and have built tall chimney stacks there is still a pollution of the atmosphere and smoke can always be seen pouring out of the chimney.The factory began operating in 1963.There was a large expansion programme in 1968. The main raw material for Baglan Bay comes from the B.P. refinery at Llandarcy which is only a short distance away.The products are either taken to Barry or exported from Queens Dock Swansea.
